description_carte: Master of the tides, protects allies with watery barriers and crushing waves.
description_visuelle: Knight in flowing blue armor that resembles ocean waves. Water constantly drips from the armor. Wields a trident that crackles with energy.

skills.name: Water Jet
skills.description: A focused blast of water that deals moderate damage.

skills.name: Tidal Barrier
skills.description: Creates a protective barrier around an ally, increasing their defense.

skills.name: Crushing Wave
skills.description: Summons a wave to crash down on the enemy, dealing heavy damage and slowing them.

skills.name: Healing Rain
skills.description: Summons a refreshing rain that heals all allies.

skills.name: Ocean's Fury
skills.description: Calls upon the ocean's wrath, dealing massive damage and stunning the primary target.
